messages.messageBody:
Thank you for the links J This is our first year truly unschooling and while
we are still learning and changing things up I have already started to see
improvements around here.



Amanda

Thomas, 9

Jon, 8

Emily 2

messages.subject: Re: introduction  :)
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, Missy! I m Meredith, mom to always unschooled Morgan (9)and step mom to Ray (17) who s had homeschooling, school, and now unschooling - and unschooling
messages.messageBody:
Hi, Missy! I'm Meredith, mom to "always unschooled" Morgan (9)and step mom to Ray (17) who's had homeschooling, school, and now unschooling - and unschooling is definitely best! :)

Here are a few basic links, in case you haven't found them yet:

http://sandradodd.com/unschooling
http://joyfullyrejoycing.com/
http://whyunschool.info/

http://sites.google.com/site/dragonflykaizen/unschooling-1
http://enjoylifeunschooling.com/resources/

This particular list is largely Q&A in format, so chime in with a question any time you like.

---Meredith

messages.subject: introduction  :)
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everybody! Just found out about this group and am excited to find all of you!  We ve been unschoolers since this past October.  I have two kids - Jonah (age
messages.messageBody:
Hi everybody!

Just found out about this group and am excited to find all of you! We've been unschoolers since this past October. I have two kids - Jonah (age 6) and Maeryn (age 2.5). Hoping to learn a lot from this group!

- Missy
